function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential over-representation of categories in the data sample","Impact":"Bias in the analysis and results, leading to inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Ensure balanced representation of categories in the data sample through random sampling or stratification","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software for data sampling and stratification","People":"Research team, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases during qualitative research settings","Impact":"Risk of infection for researchers and participants, especially in vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols, use remote data collection methods, and provide protective equipment","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools, video conferencing platforms, personal protective equipment","People":"Researchers, community members","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Lack of exploration of the impact of daily tasks on households during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Missed insights into the effects of teleworking and other activities on households, leading to limited understanding","Mitigation":"Conduct further detailed analysis of the impact of daily tasks on different household types and demographics","Technologies":"Data analysis software, survey tools","People":"Research team, policymakers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
